00022 class Graph {
00023 public:
00024         // --------
00025         // typedefs
00026         // --------
00027 
00028         typedef unsigned int vertex_descriptor;
00029         typedef std::pair<vertex_descriptor, vertex_descriptor> edge_descriptor;
00030 
00031         typedef std::vector<vertex_descriptor>::const_iterator vertex_iterator;
00032         typedef std::vector<edge_descriptor>::const_iterator edge_iterator;
00033         typedef std::vector<vertex_descriptor>::const_iterator adjacency_iterator;
00034 
00035         typedef std::size_t vertices_size_type;
00036         typedef std::size_t edges_size_type;
00037 
00038 public:
00039         // --------
00040         // add_edge
00041         // --------
00042 
00052         friend std::pair<edge_descriptor, bool> add_edge(vertex_descriptor vd1,
00053                         vertex_descriptor vd2, Graph& graph) {
00054 
00055                 std::pair<edge_descriptor, bool> p = edge(vd1, vd2, graph);
00056                 edge_descriptor ed;
00057                 bool b;
00058                 if (p.second) {
00059                         ed = p.first;
00060                         b = false;
00061                 } else {
00062                         graph.g[vd1].push_back(vd2);
00063                         ed = std::make_pair(vd1, vd2);
00064                         graph.elist.push_back(ed);
00065                         b = true;
00066                         ++graph._num_edges;
00067                 }
00068                 return std::make_pair(ed, b);
00069         }
00070 
00071         // ----------
00072         // add_vertex
00073         // ----------
00074 
00079         friend vertex_descriptor add_vertex(Graph& graph) {
00080                 vertex_descriptor vd = graph.g.size();
00081                 graph.vlist.push_back(vd);
00082                 std::vector<vertex_descriptor> v;
00083                 graph.g.push_back(v);
00084                 ++graph._num_vertices;
00085                 return vd;
00086         }
00087 
00088         // -----------------
00089         // adjacent_vertices
00090         // -----------------
00091 
00098         friend std::pair<adjacency_iterator, adjacency_iterator> adjacent_vertices(
00099                         vertex_descriptor vd, const Graph& graph) {
00100                 adjacency_iterator b = graph.g[vd].begin();
00101                 adjacency_iterator e = graph.g[vd].end();
00102                 return std::make_pair(b, e);
00103         }
00104 
00105         // ----
00106         // edge
00107         // ----
00108 
00116         friend std::pair<edge_descriptor, bool> edge(vertex_descriptor vd1,
00117                         vertex_descriptor vd2, const Graph& graph) {
00118                 edge_descriptor ed = std::make_pair(0, 0);
00119                 bool b = false;
00120                 if (vd1 < graph.g.size()) {
00121                         if (vd2 < graph.g[vd1].size()) {
00122                                 ed = std::make_pair(vd1, vd2);
00123                                 b = true;
00124                         }
00125                 }
00126                 return std::make_pair(ed, b);
00127         }
00128 
00129         // -----
00130         // edges
00131         // -----
00132 
00138         friend std::pair<edge_iterator, edge_iterator> edges(const Graph& graph) {
00139                 // <your code>
00140                 edge_iterator b = graph.elist.begin();
00141                 edge_iterator e = graph.elist.end();
00142                 return std::make_pair(b, e);
00143         }
00144 
00145         // ---------
00146         // num_edges
00147         // ---------
00148 
00153         friend edges_size_type num_edges(const Graph& graph) {
00154                 return graph._num_edges;
00155         }
00156 
00157         // ------------
00158         // num_vertices
00159         // ------------
00160 
00165         friend vertices_size_type num_vertices(const Graph& graph) {
00166                 return graph._num_vertices;
00167         }
00168 
00169         // ------
00170         // source
00171         // ------
00172 
00179         friend vertex_descriptor source(edge_descriptor ed, const Graph& graph) {
00180                 assert (ed.first < graph.g.size());
00181                 return ed.first;
00182         }
00183 
00184         // ------
00185         // target
00186         // ------
00187 
00194         friend vertex_descriptor target(edge_descriptor ed, const Graph& graph) {
00195                 assert (ed.first < graph.g.size());
00196                 assert (ed.second < graph.g[ed.first].size());
00197                 return ed.second;
00198         }
00199 
00200         // ------
00201         // vertex
00202         // ------
00203 
00209         friend vertex_descriptor vertex(vertices_size_type v, const Graph& graph) {
00210                 assert (v < graph.g.size());
00211                 return v;
00212         }
00213 
00214         // --------
00215         // vertices
00216         // --------
00217 
00222         friend std::pair<vertex_iterator, vertex_iterator> vertices(
00223                         const Graph& graph) {
00224                 vertex_iterator b = graph.vlist.begin();
00225                 vertex_iterator e = graph.vlist.end();
00226                 return std::make_pair(b, e);
00227         }
00228 
00229 private:
00230         // ----
00231         // data
00232         // ----
00233 
00234         std::vector<vertex_descriptor> vlist;
00235         std::vector<edge_descriptor> elist;
00236         std::vector<std::vector<vertex_descriptor> > g; // something like this
00237         vertices_size_type _num_vertices;
00238         edges_size_type _num_edges;
00239 
00240         // -----
00241         // valid
00242         // -----
00243 
00247         bool valid() const {
00248                 bool val = true;
00249                 if (_num_vertices < 0 || _num_edges < 0)
00250                         val = false;
00251                 return val;
00252         }
00253

00255         // ------------
00256         // constructors
00257         // ------------
00258 
00262         Graph() {
00263                 _num_vertices = 0;
00264                 _num_edges = 0;
00265                 assert(valid());
00266         }

00274 // ---------
00275 // has_cycle
00276 // ---------
00277 
00285 template<typename G>
00286 bool has_cycle(const G& g) {
00287 
00288         typedef typename G::vertex_descriptor vertex_descriptor;
00289         typedef typename G::vertex_iterator vertex_iterator;
00290 
00291         std::set<vertex_descriptor> grey_list;
00292         std::set<vertex_descriptor> black_list;
00293 
00294         std::pair<vertex_iterator, vertex_iterator> p = vertices(g);
00295         vertex_iterator b = p.first;
00296         vertex_iterator e = p.second;
00297 
00298         bool r = false;
00299         while (b != e && !r) {
00300                 if (black_list.find(*b) == black_list.end())
00301                         r = has_cycle_helper(*b, grey_list, black_list, g);
00302                 ++b;
00303         }
00304         return r;
00305 }
00306 
00317 template<typename G>
00318 bool has_cycle_helper(typename G::vertex_descriptor vd,
00319                 std::set<typename G::vertex_descriptor>& grey_list,
00320                 std::set<typename G::vertex_descriptor>& black_list, const G& g) {
00321 
00322         std::pair<typename G::adjacency_iterator, typename G::adjacency_iterator>
00323                         p = adjacent_vertices(vd, g);
00324         typename G::adjacency_iterator b = p.first;
00325         typename G::adjacency_iterator e = p.second;
00326 
00327         bool r = false;
00328         if (grey_list.find(vd) == grey_list.end()) {
00329                 grey_list.insert(vd);
00330                 while (b != e && !r) {
00331                         if (black_list.find(*b) == black_list.end())
00332                                 r = has_cycle_helper(*b, grey_list, black_list, g);
00333                         ++b;
00334                 }
00335                 if (!r) {
00336                         grey_list.erase(vd);
00337                         black_list.insert(vd);
00338                 }
00339         } else {
00340                 r = true;
00341         }
00342 
00343         return r;
00344 }

00346 // ----------------
00347 // topological_sort
00348 // ----------------
00349 
00357 template<typename G, typename OI>
00358 void topological_sort(const G& g, OI x) {
00359 
00360         typedef typename G::vertex_descriptor vertex_descriptor;
00361         typedef typename G::vertex_iterator vertex_iterator;
00362         typedef typename G::edge_descriptor edge_descriptor;
00363         typedef typename G::edge_iterator edge_iterator;
00364 
00365         assert(!has_cycle(g));
00366 
00367         std::vector<vertex_descriptor> sorted; //list that will contain the sorted nodes (will be in reverse order)
00368         std::set<vertex_descriptor> roots; //all nodes with no incoming edges
00369         std::set<vertex_descriptor> visited;
00370 
00371         std::pair<vertex_iterator, vertex_iterator> p1 =
00372                         vertices(g);
00373         std::pair<edge_iterator, edge_iterator> p2 = edges(
00374                         g);
00375         vertex_iterator b1 = p1.first;
00376         vertex_iterator e1 = p1.second;
00377         edge_iterator b2 = p2.first;
00378         edge_iterator e2 = p2.second;
00379 
00380         while (b1 != e1) {
00381                 roots.insert(*b1);
00382                 ++b1;
00383         }
00384         while (b2 != e2) {
00385                 roots.erase(target(*b2, g));
00386                 ++b2;
00387         }
00388 
00389         typename std::set<vertex_descriptor, std::less<vertex_descriptor>,
00390                         std::allocator<vertex_descriptor> >::iterator b3 = roots.begin();
00391         typename std::set<vertex_descriptor, std::less<vertex_descriptor>,
00392                         std::allocator<vertex_descriptor> >::iterator e3 = roots.end();
00393 
00394         while (b3 != e3) {
00395                 tsort_helper(*b3, sorted, visited, g);
00396                 ++b3;
00397         }
00398 
00399         while (!sorted.empty()) {
00400                 *x = sorted.back();
00401                 sorted.pop_back();
00402                 ++x;
00403         }
00404 }
00405 
00417 template<typename G>
00418 void tsort_helper(typename G::vertex_descriptor vd,
00419                 std::vector<typename G::vertex_descriptor>& sorted,
00420                 std::set<typename G::vertex_descriptor>& visited, const G& g) {
00421 
00422         if (visited.find(vd) == visited.end()) {
00423                 visited.insert(vd);
00424 
00425                 std::pair<typename G::adjacency_iterator,
00426                                 typename G::adjacency_iterator> p = adjacent_vertices(vd, g);
00427                 typename G::adjacency_iterator b = p.first;
00428                 typename G::adjacency_iterator e = p.second;
00429 
00430                 while (b != e) {
00431                         tsort_helper(*b, sorted, visited, g);
00432                         ++b;
00433                 }
00434                 sorted.push_back(vd);
00435         }
00436 }
